business_analysis.description:
**Business Summary: Manipal Fintech**

**Business Model:**
Manipal Fintech operates as a Gold-Tech Fintech platform, primarily offering gold loans with minimal paperwork and quick approvals. The company leverages technology to streamline the loan process, providing services both online and at customers' doorsteps.

**Industry:**
Manipal Fintech is part of the Financial Services industry, specifically focusing on fintech solutions related to gold loans.

**Key Products/Services:**
1. **Gold Loans:** The primary service offered by Manipal Fintech, allowing customers to use their gold jewelry as collateral to obtain loans.
2. **Balance Transfer:** Customers can transfer their existing gold loans to Manipal Fintech to benefit from lower interest rates.
3. **Gold Loan at Home:** A service where loan officers visit customers' homes to complete the loan application process.

**Market Position:**
Manipal Fintech is positioned as India’s most trusted gold loans brand, backed by The Manipal Group. The company has disbursed loans worth over ₹16,000 crore to more than 400,000 customers across India. This extensive reach and substantial loan disbursement highlight its strong market presence and customer trust.

**Financial Information:**
- **Loan Disbursement:** ₹16,000 crore worth of loans disbursed.
- **Customer Base:** Over 400,000 happy customers.
- **Interest Rates:** Gold loan interest rates starting at 9.48% per annum.

**Company Size and Headquarters:**
- **Employees:** 201-500 employees.
- **Headquarters:** Gurugram, Haryana, India.

**Recent Developments:**
Manipal Fintech hosted an event titled "Beyond Bullion - Redefining Lending Through Fintech 2025," which emphasized the company's commitment to innovation and collaboration in the lending space. The event featured discussions on the future of lending, fintech-bank partnerships, and the role of AI in transforming lending models.

**Leadership:**
- **CEO:** Puja Abhishek Singh
- **Chief Business Officer:** Ramkumar Subramonian

Manipal Fintech continues to expand its services and innovate within the gold loan sector, aiming to become a diversified fintech brand beyond gold loans.

recommendations: LinkedIn User “Here’s a more concise, three-paragraph version of your recommendation: I had the privilege of working directly under Puja’s leadership, and she is undoubtedly one of the finest managers I have had the opportunity to work with. Puja fosters a culture of inclusivity, ensuring every team member feels valued and heard. Her empathetic approach and ability to encourage team participation leave a lasting impression on everyone she works with. From a business perspective, Puja is sharp and decisive, with an exceptional ability to assess her team’s strengths and weaknesses. She strategically assigns tasks to maximize productivity and brings out the best in her team, driving outstanding results while motivating individuals to perform at their highest potential. Personally, I have always looked up to Puja for guidance and inspiration. Her leadership style has significantly influenced my approach to work and has set a benchmark for what great management looks like. She is truly a remarkable leader and an asset to any organization.”

Varun Jain “I had the pleasure of working with Puja Singh at Mastercard for about 4 years, she is a true business leader with a proven track record of success in the financial services industry. Her ability to drive significant results is exceptional. She's a strategic thinker, an effective communicator and a highly motivated individual with a genuine passion for achieving results. Puja is a valuable asset to any team. Her strong work ethic, collaborative spirit & dedication to excellence make her a standout performer. I have no doubt she will continue to achieve great things in her career.”

detailed_profile.name: Rahul Virmani
detailed_profile.position: Vice President & National Sales Head in Manipal Fintech Private Limited (A Manipal Group Company)
detailed_profile.about: Rahul is a seasoned Sales & Marketing, Business Development professional with 21 years of experience in BPO/Contact Center in Banking, Financial Service & Insurance /Fin-tech & SME Financing domains for B2C & B2B segments. Expertise in taking up start-ups, successfully setting up & scaling telesales & sales teams for managing third party distribution products across pan india with a team size of 400+ agents through telesales, direct sales & channel partner sales. Responsible for Managing P&L, sales operations, business development, target planning & strategy, decision making, revenue generation, productivity enhancement and data management

experience.title: Vice President- Inside Sales
experience.description: Setting up the distribution network for selling third party financial products. Set up the telesales & sales team of 450+ agents for managing business pan india. Managed business with telesales, channel sales & direct sales team. Responsible for busines volumes, per seat productivity and P&L.
